definition: (soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: I was really happy to score that goal.
Wilshere started against Juventus on Saturday and went close with a volley in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 小威在周六与尤文的比赛中首发，上半场有一脚射门。

sentences.english: Maybe I had too much time to think about what I had to do, " the 26-year-old said.
sentences.chinese: 可能我考虑花太多时间去想怎么射门了。

sentences.english: They've built a wall of players for a penalty shot.
sentences.chinese: 他们筑起一堵人墙准备对付罚点球射门。

sentences.english: Her shot went whistling past the goalpost .
sentences.chinese: 她的射门呼啸着越过球门柱。

sentences.english: I am training outside but hitting the ball is still very painful.
sentences.chinese: 我已经在球场外训练，但是射门还有感觉有点痛。

sentences.english: The same goes for shooting: he had no shots on or off target.
sentences.chinese: 也没有任何射门，无论是射中球门或者射飞。

sentences.english: It was against us that Nigel Winterburn cracked one in from 25 yards.
sentences.chinese: 还是在和我们的比赛中，温特本在25码外射门得分。

sentences.english: They should be able to score from 12 yards.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该能从12码的位置射门得分。

sentences.english: Raul made Canizares break into a sweat with a shot to the post;
sentences.chinese: 劳尔的射门让卡尼萨雷斯惊出了一身冷汗。

sentences.english: When you see him play it never comes to your mind that this guy is a goal-scorer.
sentences.chinese: 当你看到他踢球，你绝不会认为他会是一个射门机器。

sentences.english: Corner kicks have become an important way to shoot and score.
sentences.chinese: 角球已成为射门得分的重要手段。

sentences.english: Strike-partner Andriy Shevchenko also went close, slamming an effort against the woodwork.
sentences.chinese: 锋线搭档舍甫琴科也有机会，但他的射门打在门柱上。

sentences.english: Unfortunately for them, Podolski's finishing was erratic throughout the whole game.
sentences.chinese: 可不巧的是，整场波多尔斯基的射门大失水准。

sentences.english: A revolutionary, new multi-shot ECD from TASER International.
sentences.chinese: 一种革命性的，新的多射门Taser国际创意总监。

definition: to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
